channel.title: Moparscape is Riddled with Incompetence, and that is why i am leaving
channel.description:
But, before i go, im going to show you all what the community has become.
Major Reason i am leaving: People like the Following. [quote="PEN()R, post:13, topic:164461"]Leach my penis, froob.
TX'es
Its rune-loft client renamed. Punish that leaching piece of froobiness. Im frightened of these forums.[/quote]
[quote="t x, post:17, topic:164461"]That is my client ROFL LEECHER PLEASE[/quote]
[quote="dantotman, post:23, topic:164461"]woooooooooooow looks like my client how strange[/quote]
[quote="eczema3, post:415, topic:164461"][quote author=t x link=topic=223305.msg1928347#msg1928347 date=1197565287] That is my client ROFL LEECHER PLEASE [/quote]
WWWWRRRRROOOONNNNGGGGGG
'tis CSK client, which YOU! leeched..[/quote]
[quote="medievil, post:414, topic:164461"]looks nice btw leech[/quote]
And it just continues. People accusing of leeching, even though they have no proof what-so-ever.
Reason #2. Idiots. How hard is it to follow rules? Honestly. Every Other hour there is a "New Serious" Devolpment team, wich happens to be based around a forum, wich is not allowed. Or then people post stuff in the most inapropriate section's. Look at some of these posts.
**Posted in Moparscape Questions** [quote="sasuke8787, post:1, topic:179638"]okj i downloaded and installed jdk but it says i dont have it whats the problem[/quote]
[quote="sixy16, post:1, topic:179678"]addme at fofosho331@hotmail.com u do nothing i code and all just message me![/quote]
**end**
People just dont follow basic rules. Moparscape Questions is for MOPARSCAPE CLIENT QUESTIONS, not pl0x hst m l33ch3d srvr.
So basically, to sum it up, Moparscape.org is riddled with Incompetence.
And so, i will be departing this community, and i wont be going to Runelocus, it will end up like Moparscape one day, it is inivetible, and google is already screw'd too much. But there are alot of Good user's out there, who followed the rules, and were helpfull.
Im not going to name them, but im sure they know who they are.

Major Reason i am leaving:
People like the Following.

WWWWRRRRROOOONNNNGGGGGG

'tis CSK client, which YOU! leeched…

looks nice btw leech

And it just continues. People accusing of leeching, even though they have no proof what-so-ever.

Reason #2. Idiots.
How hard is it to follow rules? Honestly. Every Other hour there is a “New Serious” Devolpment team, wich happens to be based around a forum, wich is not allowed. Or then people post stuff in the most inapropriate section’s. Look at some of these posts.

Posted in Moparscape Questions

okj i downloaded and installed jdk but it says i dont have it whats the problem

end

People just dont follow basic rules. Moparscape Questions is for MOPARSCAPE CLIENT QUESTIONS, not pl0x hst m l33ch3d srvr.

So basically, to sum it up, Moparscape.org is riddled with Incompetence.

And so, i will be departing this community, and i wont be going to Runelocus, it will end up like Moparscape one day, it is inivetible, and google is already screw’d too much.
But there are alot of Good user’s out there, who followed the rules, and were helpfull.

Im not going to name them, but im sure they know who they are.[/quote]
Yeah, I fucking hate it too. I wish everyone were born with a working brain.
